page.title: 13Clanna Pond
page.content: {Clanna Pond }is very popular because there are quite a few different ways to get there but you can only go {half {way}with the car.All of the streams lead to the {River Severn}.In one part of a stream there are some places you can paddle and dangle your feet off a bridge.They are now renewing the old muddy path to a {new} path.There are quite a few {living }things in the pond like trout,frogs,tadpoles and ducks and around it like deer,rabbits and pheasants.A lot of people go { {fishing }and {picnicking }there.It is very nice to look at it from the side because you can see most of it.There are about three little wooden bridges over the little streams.You would see a lot of wood pigeons around in the fir trees .There are quite a lot of {bluebells}mixed with{stitchwort}in the spring.
